suggest.doctrine/migrations: For using the Doctrine migration classes (~1.0 is recommended)
suggest.symfony/asset: For using the AdminLte package to register asset alias in Twig (~3.0 is recommended)
suggest.symfony/config: For using the FileConfig (~3.0 is recommended)
suggest.doctrine/dbal: For using the Doctrine family classes (~2.2 is recommended)
suggest.jolicode/jolinotif: For using the Monolog desktop notification handler (^1.0.5 is recommended)
suggest.symfony/filesystem: For using the Composer scripts (~3.0 is recommended)
suggest.symfony/yaml: For using the FileConfig with YAML files (~3.0 is recommended)
suggest.phpunit/phpunit: For using the Test family classes (~4.8 is recommended)
suggest.symfony/twig-bridge: For using the Twig AssetExtension to register AdminLte asset alias (~3.0 is recommended)
suggest.monolog/monolog: For using the Monolog family classes (~1.0 is recommended)
